title.rendered: Fairy Loot and 3PL Partner to Provide Subscription Box Fulfilment with a Fairytale Ending

Fairy Loot, the fantasy monthly book subscription box for young adults has teamed up with the UK leader in order fulfilment 3PL to help provide their legions of customers with post-purchase perfection.

Known for its monthly fantasy book box, Fairy Loot has quickly grown an international fanbase of crossover fantasy lovers and since launching in 2016 has become one of the most popular online Young Adult book clubs. Partnering with the best authors and leading publishing houses, each box contains special edition books, exclusive content and highly-quality bookish goodies to create a curated literature experience with lots of surprises.

The partnership with 3PL is an ideal pairing that marries the pleasurable and practical factors that go with monthly book clubs. While Fairy Loot provides the passion and community engagement that fantasy book lovers desire, 3PL provides the tailored subscription box fulfilment, kitting and assembly a memorable unboxing experience that keeps customers enthralled.

“Partnering with a unique brand like Fairy Loot is the stuff of fantasy,” Chris Plant, Sales Manager at 3PL commented “Fairy Loot put lots of love and attention into every subscription box and out team will be working closely to ensure that each customer experience is a magical one.”

“We are delighted with the service and care that 3PL provides. Their attention to detail and solutions to kitting our subscription boxes are seamless and efficient, making this a great partnership,” Annisa, Co-Founder of Fairy Loot commented “I also wanted to say that the whole team has been incredibly happy with the solution 3PL has provided. Ryan Walker is really wonderful, and we really consider ourselves lucky to have him looking after us.”

To discover more about Fairy Loot subscription boxes, visit www.fairyloot.com

About 3PL

Based in Wigan, 3PL provides multichannel ecommerce fulfilment & logistics to fast growing brands. As an end-to-end fulfilment solution, 3PL operates from over 250,000 sq. ft of shared user warehousing in the UK, supported by access to a network of International warehouses to support International expansion for its clients. Its fast-moving operations house over 9 million units of stock, across 32,000 product lines.

About Fairy Loot

Launched in 2016, Fairy Loot was created by Anissa, your average bookworm and lover of all things fantasy, and her partner Michael. They wanted to share their love for fantasy with book lovers around the world and build a passionate community of like-minded readers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
